class.name: q2java.baseq2.BaseQ2
class.change: init() and unload() updated to add and remove "q2java.baseq2" from the game's "packagePath" property.

class.name: q2java.baseq2.Player
class.fix: cmd_say() fixed to catch case of empty-string being passed as an arg - so a NullPointerException isn't thrown.
class.change: getMaxAmmoCount() made public - so that property can be manipulated by external objects like item_pack
setAmmoCount() methods make sure that the ammo count doesn't exceed the maxAmmoCount
class.addition: setMaxAmmoCount() - to go along with getMaxAmmoCount()

class.name: q2java.baseq2.spawn.item_pack
class.addition: New class, to implement ammo backpacks that increase a player's capacity, and gives a quick ammo-refill.

class.name: q2java.core.BasicServerCommands
class.addition: Several of the basic server commands were removed from the Game class and moved into this new class.

class.name: q2java.core.DefaultClassFactory
class.change: This class has been reworked to just handle locating classes, and no longer involves itself with gamelet management.

class.name: q2java.core.Game
class.change: svcmd_addgamelet(), svcmd_removegamelet() moved to the new GameletManager class.
svcmd_help(), svcmd_javagc(), svcmd_javamem(), svcmd_properties() moved to new BasicServerCommands class.
Gamelet management split off into new GameletManager class, so addGamelet(), getGamelet(), removeGamelet(),
class.addition: A new Game property, the "packagePath" - manipulated with addPackagePath() and removePackagePath() methods has been added. Basically the Game class will keep track of a list of package names, and ClassFactory objects will refer to it when trying to figure out the full Java classnames of partially specified classes (such as when it needs to figure out that "weapon_rocket" is implemented by "q2java.baseq2.spawn.weapon_rocket").

class.name: q2java.core.GameletManager
class.addition: Gamelet management was been taken out of the Game and DefaultClassFactory classes and moved here. The Game class has setGameletManager() and getGameletManager() methods to access the Game's current GameletManager object.

class.name: q2java.core.GameUtil
class.addition: Versions of getAngle3f(), getPoint3f(), and getSpawnArg() to work with DOM elements instead of old-fashioned arrays of strings.
New versions of randomInt() to more conveniently generate random numbers on the ranges 0..n-1, given a value n, or in the range x..y given x and y.

class.name: q2java.core.GameletManager
class.change: init() and unload() add/remove the package "q2java.ctf" to the Game's packagePath
